name: Super Retro World
description:
Super Retro World.

Based on a romance.

Help the cute squirrel to rescue the pretty princess!!!
Many levels of pure mario-type platform action awake memories from the 1980s.
Funny creatures are trying to stop the squirrel from helping pretty princess.
The squirrel is using spinning peanuts in order to defend itself.
Hard to beat end-of-level Bosses are there too, aiming to stop super squirrel from completing his mission.

Enjoy the game!!!

Use the Arrow Keys or WASD to move (W or Up,S or Down,A or Left, D or Right) and Control (Ctrl) to throw peanuts.
